title: Problem For Prom
body: Every time when i was playing prom, my teammate always be unskilled player, like last 1st prom game, our nasus continuous failures about 4 games, same as our sup, and the mid lane which practiced champ in the rank, but for the enemy team,  they all straight win before(like win 5 in 7 games, 9 straight wins etc). I just wondering, what's the mechanism to distribute teammate.
